snippet.title: Sopa Announcement Teaser
snippet.description: Sopa is a narrative adventure about the things we pass on. Miho steps into the pantry to get a potato for his grandmothers' soup but is instead pulled into a distant, fantastical land. "Inspired by Spirited Away, The Little Prince, and Coco." https://store.steampowered.com/app/1935330/Sopa/ #indiegames #gaming #xbox
